original_text: And Abel also brought an offering—fat portions from some of the firstborn of his flock. The Lord looked with favor on Abel and his offering,
korean_text: 아벨은 자기도 양의 첫 새끼와 그 기름으로 드렸더니 여호와께서 아벨과 그의 제물은 받으셨으나

sentences.original_text: And Abel also brought an offering
fat portions from some of the firstborn of his flock
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 양 떼의 첫태어낸 것들 중 기름진 부분이었다

sentences.original_text: The Lord looked with favor on Abel
